column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: After taking a dose of this drug, diarrhea ensued. It may have help with the cough somewhat, but the side effect of the diarrhea overrides any benefit it may have.

column2: Sagittarius89, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medicine at 11:30pm for a cough that seemed to be killing me. Around 12:30am, I felt extremely wired, the room was spinning, and everything was moving in slow motion. I became extremely hot and when I laid down, I couldn't catch my breath. On top of all that, the cough never stopped. This is absolutely the worse product I have ever taken!

I took Delsym 12 hour for a cough that kept me from sleeping. It was recommended by the store pharmacist.  A couple of hours later I got severe diarrhea.  I stopped Delsym after two doses.  The diarrhea was worse then the cough.  Note the cough never subsided.

column2: 25-34 on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This has really help reduce the coughing.  The medince does make me feel a little weird but all cold medicine does.  Helped me sleep through the night. I would recommend this to anyone with a cough.

column2: jean, 65-74 on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: took for 4 days,dificulty walking and talking,dilate pupils,hyper- racy stimulated. Felt like adrenaline surges. It's been 60+ hrs. since last dose and my eyes are still dilated.

column2: kaylin, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This medicine made my heart beat very rapidly, and I felt like I couldn't breathe. I almost went to the emergency room. Will never take again.

column2: Autumn2010, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medicine at about 12pm and started feeling weird. I felt nauseated, drowsy and anxious. although it helped to minimize the coughing came time to go to sleep i couldn't sleep until 4am. This medicine took a long time to wear off. mind you i only took one dose of it.

column2: momtoAva, 3-6 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: I gave the Pediatric Delysm 12 hour to quiet my daughter's cough - she is almost 4.  She had a half tsp in the a.m. and it seemed to quiet her cough a little.  Then my husband gave her another 1/2 tsp after dinner and it seemed to cause extreme excitability, it had been 9 hours since her last dose.  The early dose was due to our lack of communicating but it seems to be a pattern of initial bounce off the walls excitability.  It works to quiet the cough somewhat but not entirely.  She is still coughing about once every half hour.

I started this drug this morning. It helped quiet the cough for a short time but my heart rate jump up. My heart was beating so hard ...it didn`t feel well at all. I STOPPED right there. I will stick with Robbertussin ...

column2: 13-18 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: First time I took it, it made me wide awake at bed time but did quiet the cough immensly. Second time I took it I fell asleep with no issues and finally slept through the night without coughing.
Worked well to start.  3 hours later, my chin and nose started to itch and burn.  4 hours later my dry cough was back

column2: pebbles08061954@yahoo.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: After treating my nagging post nasal sinus cough with Delsym I awaoke with a muzzieness akin to a hang over and this was the Alcohol-free brand I took. It did indeed calm my cough though which at work I what I need. Is this muzzieness common?

column2: Chi Guy, 25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medicnie for cold symptoms and ended up feeling worse than before.  I had an allergic reaction to this medicine that came with severe dizziness, blurred vision, high heart rate, trouble breathing, nause and clamy palms.  I have been taking this drug for a while and this is the first I have experienced.  I would strongly advise people to be very careful when taking this drug.

column2: up all night coughing, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: it tastes nasty and didn't work for me.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have taken this medicine twice to try to help with my cough.  It eased it at first, but then I didn't sleep at all, everytime I closed my eyes they popped back open.  Also, it caused my eyes to dialate and made it extremely difficult for me to see.  I'm not sure why this happened, or what else could have caused it.  I wasn't sure it was this medication until this last time I took it, it was the only thing I took and that is what the result was.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I thought this would stop me from coughing but it only slowed it dowed it down for the first hour. Since then I haven't noticed a difference. Not impressed and it was twice the price of other over the counter cough syrups so I wouldn't spend the money for this again.
